definition: a monument/an upright stone tablet/stele/CL:塊|块[kuai4],面[mian4]

sentences.english: Chapter four analyzes artistic characteristics of Yu Xin's epigraph works.
sentences.chinese: 第四章，主要對庾信碑誌文的藝術特點進行分析。

sentences.english: Chapter three analyzes the content of Yu Xin's epigraph works.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，主要對庾信碑誌文作品內容進行分析。

sentences.english: Preserved now on the Korean Peninsula are 233 inscriptions on ancient bronzes and stone tablets that are related to the Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 現存朝鮮半島和唐朝關聯的金石碑誌共有233篇。
我們曾看過他的一七五八年的碑誌。

sentences.english: It is typical in Yuan Haowen s epitaphs "to portray a character in narrating events".
sentences.chinese: “以事寫人”是元好問碑誌文的重要特色。

definition: Sima Guang (1019-1086), politician and historian of Northern Song, author of Comprehensive Mirror for aid in Government 資治通鑒|资治通鉴
short comment or critical appraisal added at the end of a text, on a painting etc
inscribed stone tablet placed in the tomb/memorial inscription on such a tablet
to read and interpret ancient texts/to decipher
